definition: perfect or complete or pure, something that is conceived or that exists independently and not in relation to other things
details:
adjective
- perfect or complete or pure
= example: perfect or complete or pure
- not capable of being violated or infringed
= synonyms: infrangible, inviolable
- complete and without restriction or qualification
= synonyms: downright
- not limited by law
= example: not limited by law
- expressing finality with no implication of possible change
= example: expressing finality with no implication of possible change
noun
- something that is conceived or that exists independently and not in relation to other things
